title: Individual Income Tax Filing: Statutory Adjustments: Individual Retirement Arrangements Deduction
notes:
Contributions to education and Roth IRAs were nondeductible and are, therefore, not included in the statistics. 

For additional information about the return filing requirements, see the annual reports, Statistics of Income-Individual Income Tax Returns at https://www.irs.gov/uac/soi-tax-stats-historical-data-tables.
